title: Watchcraft

description: Tired of searching for the perfect watchface for your smart wear? Search no more because Watchcraft brings you the premium quality watchfaces all in one place. Marvelous collection of quality watch face, designed for almost all android supported smart watches. With dozens of preloaded quality watch faces and more updated every week you will never be bored again. Watchcraft is essential to every smartwatch owner. Go Free or Go Pro Watchcraft features multiple watchfaces ranging from free to paid designs. You can get the free watch face designs or you can purchase the paid designs separately. The best is yet to come, Watchcraft offers an efficient monthly/annually subscription plan at a very low price.When you subscribe you get access to all the free and paid watch faces for a month or for a year depending upon the plan. Weekly Supplies Watchcraft is updated every week with newly designed free/paid watchfaces for your smart wear. Now you donâ€™t have to worry about running out of designs because they are always adding up. Easy Search Watchcraft is designed with categories so you can search easily what type of watch face you are looking for. Or scroll through different categories and stay updated with newly added watchfaces every week. Supports all Watchcraft and all the watchfaces are designed to support all of the smart watches regardless of their size and shape. However the following models work flawless with Watchcraft !MotoSamsungSonyHuaweiNoteWe want to stay close to our users and solve their issue at our earliest convenience. So before going outrageous on store, give us your feedback through the in-app feedback service in settings section or just email us on nextin.play@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Tired of searching for the perfect watchface for your smart wear? Search no more because Watchcraft brings you the premium quality watchfaces all in one place. Marvelous collection of quality watch face, designed for almost all android supported smart watches. With dozens of preloaded quality watch faces and more updated every week you will never be bored again. Watchcraft is essential to every smartwatch owner.

Go Free or Go Pro

Watchcraft features multiple watchfaces ranging from free to paid designs. You can get the free watch face designs or you can purchase the paid designs separately. The best is yet to come, Watchcraft offers an efficient monthly/annually subscription plan at a very low price.
When you subscribe you get access to all the free and paid watch faces for a month or for a year depending upon the plan.

Weekly Supplies

Watchcraft is updated every week with newly designed free/paid watchfaces for your smart wear. Now you don’t have to worry about running out of designs because they are always adding up.

Easy Search

Watchcraft is designed with categories so you can search easily what type of watch face you are looking for. Or scroll through different categories and stay updated with newly added watchfaces every week.

Supports all

Watchcraft and all the watchfaces are designed to support all of the smart watches regardless of their size and shape. However the following models work flawless with Watchcraft !


  • Moto

  • Samsung

  • Sony

  • Huawei



Note

We want to stay close to our users and solve their issue at our earliest convenience. So before going outrageous on store, give us your feedback through the in-app feedback service in settings section or just email us on nextin.play@gmail.com
comments: Help I have sent an email to the developer and still have not received any help. 1)I paid for the 1 year subscription, but the app still shows that I have not. 2)The Watchcraft app still won't show up in my watch face list on my watch. Any help would be great. I don't want to give low stars until I can use the app and judge for myself, that's why I'm still giving it 5 stars.
